annotations.title: Modern Tiki: Marlin

textContent:
1oz (30ml) Light Rum
1oz (30ml) Rhum Agricole Vieux
.5oz (15ml) Blue Cura√ßao
.5oz (15ml) Luxardo Maraschino
.5oz (15ml) Orgeat
.5oz (15ml) Lemon Juice
.5oz (15ml) Lime Juice
Pineapple, Cherry, Orchid Garnish

Shake over crushed ice
Pour into glass with crushed ice
Top with crushed ice and garnish

title: Blue Marlin
